title: SvelteKit Crash Course - SSR, API Routes, Stores, Tailwind CSS, and More!
author: James Q Quick
description: SvelteKit is one of the most exciting frameworks in Web Development. With the success and growth of Next.js (framework built on top of React), SvelteKit is a promising competitor. With SvelteKit, you can create Server Side Rendered pages (SSR), API routes, and a lot more while leveraging the natural and concise syntax of Svelte.
